features: CONVENIENT MULTI-USE BAG: Whether you are travelling for business or personal reasons, this high quality oxford toiletry bag will certainly meet your needs; It was designed for both men and women, and is an extremely versatile wash bag that can be used as a traditional toiletry bag or shaving kit bag, a safe place to store your healthcare items while traveling, or it can be used as a carry-on airline bag to store needed in-flight toiletries
MADE FOR TRAVEL AND PORTABILITY: Designed with the traveler in mind, this travel kit comes with a durable side handle to ensure that carrying your bag while traveling is made easy.

HIGH-QUALITY DURABLE MATERIAL: This exceptional toiletry travel bag by emissary is made of high quality oxford, which is known for its lightweight yet durable qualities, the perfect combination for traveling; This specific material is water resistant, making it safe for use in environments where it may become wet; Making this the perfect bathroom bag, shaving bag, and travel dopp kit.

LARGE TOILETRY BAG, LARGER THAN IT LOOKS: Compact yet spacious, this travel bag provides adequate room for all your essentials. The bag as a whole measures over 9.8'' L x 5.9'' W x 4.5'' H in Inches / 25cm L x 15cm W x 11.5cm H, with a volume of nearly 4 L.

emissary 12 Month Protection: If anything were to happen to your bag in first 12 months, contact us through Amazon's messaging system and we will replace your bag or refund your purchase. Your satisfaction is our priority.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Whether you are travelling for business or personal reasons, this high quality oxford toiletry bag will certainly meet your needs.

Large Capacity Size 9.8 x 5.9 x 4.5 inches. Put shampoos and conditioners in small travel bottles into 3 small mesh pockets Put small sponge, floss picks，Facial cleanser into 1 long mesh pocket with zipper inside. Put toothpaste, comb, wipes into 1 front zipper pocket. Organized Compartments 2 Main compartment 1 Front pocket 1 Inner zipper pocket 2 Small mesh pockets

Made for Travel and Portability Designed with the traveler in mind, this travel kit comes with a durable side handle to ensure that carrying your bag while traveling is made easy. Premium Material The toiletry bag is made of premium polyester that is smell-less，it can also protect your toiletries from splashed water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 18 year to make him a shaving kit. For starters the bag is pretty durable and the handle is sturdy. It is a nice bag for its purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: My father-in-law came to live with us. He likes to keep his toiletries in a bag, as well as his medications, and checkbook. The bag he came with was kind of cheap and the zipper broke. I ordered this bag for him and it had the sections he needed and is made of a good heavy material with strong zippers. He was very pleased with the new bag.

reviews.reviewText: It came scrunched up and too small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does What It Needs to Do
reviews.reviewText: Just got my Emissary Men's Travel Toiletry Bag. Exciting, it's not.The good stuff: It appears to be sturdy. It has a number of compartments, most that can be zippered close. It is expandable, at least as far as it will hold what you need. It is listed as being 'water resistant', one of those new fangled meaningless terms (hey, almost everything is 'water resistant' to a point). If you want waterproof, put your stuff into a resealable plastic freezer bag.However, it's not a very large bag, which is not a bad thing, just annoying. After all, it's meant for a relatively small number of items when you travel. And in the era of TSA security checkpoints, this may be a more useful thing to pack in your checked luggage anyway. If you're planning on putting mouthwash and cologne and stuff as carry-on luggage, those need to handled as 3-1-1 items (if you don't know what that means, check out the TSA website).My verdict: a respectable 4 stars. The next time I travel, I'll probably use this toiletry bag for my medications. I'ts easier to buy mouthwash and other such items at my destination than to pack them anyway.
